message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm initially suggesting a price of $11,500. What are your thoughts?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $10,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,750. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
